response.answer_text: When it comes to Apple products, those who buy them are of various degrees. Those who appreciate good aesthetics and designThose who like the ecosystem - Basically the fact that it integrates well with other Apple products.Professionals that want something that work right out of the box.

People who enjoy a simplistic design and easy to use OS. People who enjoy the peace of mind that their private info, photos etc are all safe with Apple. People who are well off financially speaking. People who enjoy the whole ecosystem and brilliant syncing capabilities of other apple devices (iPads watches etc). People who use social media a lot, because lets be honest Snapchat footage on an android looks like ww2 footage. People who like to get the best apps first as the Apple App Store usually does. People who want the best and most reliable tech. People who prefer not to have their new phone catch fire…
